results.title: No. 1 On the Charts : A Look at the Australian Pop Music Industry
results.creator_credit: Don Fitzsimmons, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and TV Ed Productions
results.brief_description: Lee Simon, Basia Bonkowski, Jane Clifton and Michael Gudinski are interviewed in a forum style program about their views on the presentation of popular culture in the media. Video clips are interposed throughout the program.

results.title: Spelling it out
results.creator_credit: Sabina Baltrukomis and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
results.brief_description: Shows the teaching of spelling in primary schools from the nineteenth century to the present day. Could be used in conjunction with the Victorian Education Department’s booklet “The Teaching of spelling”. Changing attitudes and a variety of teaching methods are also looked at.

results.title: Teaching strategies in home economics
results.brief_description: First section: Analysis of food patterns, experiments related to food studies and issues of human habitat. Second section: Teaching approaches for textiles education, design and testing. No other credits available.

results.title: Olympic wrestling: an introduction
results.brief_description: Part one: Provides a history of wrestling, its suitability for schools, and a description of training programmmes for developing skills. Part two: Explains the rules of a match, the roles of the officials and the scoring system. No other credits available.

results.title: From the bottom to the top
results.creator_credit: Jim Berkey, Claire Stapleton, Paul Quinlan and Department of Education Queensland
results.brief_description: The first part of this tape encourages confidence in the water through familiarization, body awareness and movement in the water. The second part presents a natural progression from water activities to swimming skills.

results.title: Middle distance running; hurdling; the sprint
results.creator_credit: Brian Clarkson, Alan Smith and Queensland. Dept. of Education
results.brief_description: Middle-distance running” is designed to motivate the young to run, with emphasis on a training program that won’t burn the young athlete out. “Hurdling’ and “The Sprint” present a guide to correct technique, and training routines designed to reinforce these skills.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Brian Clarkson, Alan Smith and Queensland. Dept. of Education

results.title: Lawn bowls
results.creator_credit: Don Smith and Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch
results.brief_description: Designed to introduce and teach the skills of lawn bowls. Introduces the game, how and where it is played, the equipment and clothing used and provides a demostration of play and scoring. The second half presents a comprehensive overview of the basic techniques required.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Don Smith and Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch
